summary: Retexture for vanilla poisons with added animations.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][size=4][b][color=#ff0000]This mod is [font=Tahoma][size=4][b][color=#ff0000]released [font=Tahoma][size=4][b][color=#ff0000][font=Tahoma][size=4][b][color=#ff0000]ONLY [/color][/b][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font]on[/color][/b][/size][/font] Nexus. If you see it on other pages it's probably stolen. [/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=6]VERSION 2.0 IS HERE![/size][/color]
- IMPROVED TEXTURES
- IMPROVED MESHES
- DUAL COLOR POTIONS ([size=2]REMEMBER, BLACK AND GREY ARE ALSO COLORS[/size])
[/b][/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=4][b][size=6][youtube]VvQjpZ8DkUI[/youtube][youtube]7grqgxex2ds[/youtube][/size][/b][/size][/font][/center][font=Tahoma][size=4][b][center]
[size=3]Huge thanks to Amelli and Shardoom who suggested the idea for animated version and posted helpful links. Thanks guys! :)[/size][/center][size=3]
[/size][/b][/size][/font][size=3]This is the first part of[size=4] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75492/?][color=#3c78d8]Pretty Potions Mod[/color][/url][/size]. It contains 1K retexture and animations for all vanilla poisons. [color=#e06666]
[/color][/size][color=#ff7700][size=2][color=#ffffff][size=3]It's meant for vanilla graphic, but it should work with almost any ENB. Visibility of the animations and intensity of the glow depend on many factors, including:[/size]
- in-game time of the day
- use of any lightening mods
- any light sources
- use of ENB  etc.
[size=3]If you feel the effects are too strong or too weak, you can try to use one of the optional files. With some ENBs animations are
not visible during the night or they are not visible at all.[/size]
[color=#ffff00]

[/color][/color][/size][/color][size=4][b][color=#00ff00]INSTALLATION:[/color]
[/b][/size]Put the content of 000Main folder to your Data folder, then choose if you want to use regular version or thick glass bottles version (need to choose one of them) and also put it in the Data folder. 

[b][size=4][color=#00ff00]UPDATE:[/color]
[/size][/b][size=4][size=2]If you already use first version of the mod and want to update it to version 2.0, first delete "potions" folder from Data/textures/clutter, so you won't have any loose files. Then just install the new version, overwrite the rest of the files if asked. [/size][/size]


[b][size=4]KNOWN ISSUES:
[/size][/b]- sometimes there are visible pixels around the "decoration" on big poisons' bottles (from normal maps). I tried to fix it but without success so far.

[color=#ff0000]version 2.0.1:[/color]
- removed fomod folder


[size=3]NOT COMPATIBLE with any mod that changes poisons' meshes.[/size]

I hope you like it. If so, please endorse :)

If you would like to use any part of this mod, please contact me first.

Second part [color=#3c78d8][b][size=4]Pretty Potions - Regular Potions: [/size][/b][color=#ffffff][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75285/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75285/?[/url][/size][/color][/color]
